description: Signals that an entity is attempting to unlock another entity (e.g., a door, a chest). Fired before validation or state changes.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the entity attempting the unlock action.

targetEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity being targeted for unlocking.

keyItemId.description: The unique identifier of the item instance being used for the attempt, if any (typically the item triggering this event if fired by ItemUsageSystem).
